article_title: Daily News' Lupica: Mayweather All-Time Champ of Meatheads
article_text:
SIGN UP FOR OUR NEWSLETTER

New York Daily News sports columnist Mike Lupica appeared on ESPN’s “Sports Reporters” Sunday to discuss the May 2 fight with Floyd Mayweather Jr., as well as other top sports stories happening this week.

SIGN UP FOR OUR NEWSLETTER

At the opening of the show, Lupica stated, “I’ve watched plenty of rich, talented meatheads in my career, but if there were an unofficial competition of the all-time champion of them, Floyd Mayweather is the winner before he even steps into the ring next Saturday night.”

Follow Trent Baker on Twitter @MagnifiTrent
